title: Death.by.Hanging - Koshikei (1968, Nagisa Oshima) Japanese with
description:
Japan in the 1960ies: 
A young man of Korean descent is about to be executed for the 
rape and killing of two schoolgirls. But then something 
unexpected happens and slowly the whole front of law and order 
put up by the officials present at the hanging is eroded 
little by little as they reveal more and more of their true 
feelings and thoughts.

Languages: Japanese soundtrack (MP3), English subtitles (hard) 
Video: almost 2 hours (Xvid)

Director: Nagisa Oshima (Ai no corrida - In the Realm of Senses)
